Package org.jacp.javafx2.rcp.util

Class Summary
AFX2ComponentWorker<T> handles component methods in own thread;
FX2ComponentInitWorker Background Worker to execute components; handle method to init component.
FX2ComponentReplaceWorker Background Worker to execute components handle method in separate thread and to replace or add the component result node; While the handle method is executed in an own thread the postHandle method is executed in application main thread.
FX2Util Util class with helper methods
StateComponentRunWorker this class handles running stateful background components
